sentences.sentence: Audiometer is an important instrument in otolaryngology clinic.
sentences.translation: 听力计是听力检查中必不可少的设备。

sentences.sentence: Co-author Anthony Ricci, PhD, associate professor of otolaryngology, was responsible for this step of the work.
sentences.translation: 合著者安东尼.里奇博士（耳鼻喉科学助教）负责这部分研究。

sentences.sentence: Objective to explore the methods of quality control of clinical nursing teaching in department of otolaryngology.
sentences.translation: 目的探讨耳鼻喉科临床教学活动的质量控制方法。
